lore: With their mounts snorting and saddlegitz hanging on for dear life, Squighog Boyz thunder into the fight. They fling rokkit-propelled stikkas, hitting with enough force to pierce plate armour, then employ muscle, weight, momentum and sheer belligerence to squash those foes still standing to a paste.

otherAbilities.Wild Ride:: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this unitâ€™s Move characteristic and to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.
